original_text: He was driven away from people and given the mind of an animal; he lived with the wild donkeys and ate grass like the ox; and his body was drenched with the dew of heaven, until he acknowledged that the Most High God is sovereign over all kingdoms on earth and sets over them anyone he wishes.
korean_text: 사람 중에서 쫓겨나서 그의 마음이 들짐승의 마음과 같았고 또 들나귀와 함께 살며 또 소처럼 풀을 먹으며 그의 몸이 하늘 이슬에 젖었으며 지극히 높으신 하나님이 사람 나라를 다스리시며 자기의 뜻대로 누구든지 그 자리에 세우시는 줄을 알기에 이르렀나이다

sentences.original_text: He was driven away from people
and given the mind of an animal
he lived with the wild donkeys
and ate grass like the ox
and his body was drenched with the dew of heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 몸은 하늘 이슬에 젖었습니다

sentences.original_text: that the Most High God is sovereign
and sets over them anyone he wishes
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 원하는 누구든지 그들을 다스리는 자로 세우심을
